main event: A report of sightings of shiny flying discs in Spokane, Washington on June 21, 1947.
interesting points: The objects were described as being quite large and shiny-silvery in appearance., They traveled south against the prevailing winds., Witnesses initially thought they might be balloons but noted they were not traveling as fast as an airplane., The objects flashed repeatedly as they moved along., The sighting did not have an obvious astronomical explanation.
